item.title: [PI] required completionist cape levels HELP [PI]
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

boolean wearItem(
if (wearID == 65270) {
                                        for (int i = 0; i < 22; i++) {
                                        if (c.playerLevel[i] != 99) {
                                        c.sendMessage("You Need 99 In All Skills To Wear This Item!");
                                        return false;
                                                }
                                        }
                                }

I’d advise using getLevelForXP etc… Using this allows people to pot to the levels needed.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] required completionist cape levels HELP [PI]
item.dc:creator: @tlord12 tlord12
item.description:
@tlord12 wrote:

i need help to remove 2 skills from my completionist cape requirements, here is the code i have, im just clueless at the moment as to wear to put it, can anyone please help me?

( int i = 0; i < (22 this is the number of skills i want to have required for the cape)

if (wearID == 65270) {
for (int i = 0; i < 22; i++) {
if (c.playerLevel[i] < 99) {
c.sendMessage(“You Need 99 In All Skills To Wear This Item!”);
return false;
}
}
}
